<function_call>[create_file(path="/documents/resume_template.txt", content="Name: [Full Name]\nEmail: [name@example.com] | Phone: [xxx-xxx-xxxx] | LinkedIn: [linkedin.com/in/yourprofile]\n\nProfessional Summary\nA concise 2–3 sentence summary highlighting your primary skills, years of experience, and the type of role you’re seeking.\n\nExperience\nJob Title — Company Name, Location\nMonth Year – Month Year\n- Brief description of responsibilities and achievements (use bullet points).\n- Use active verbs and quantify results where possible (e.g., increased revenue by 15%).\n\nJob Title — Company Name, Location\nMonth Year – Month Year\n- Responsibility / achievement 1\n- Responsibility / achievement 2\n\nEducation\nDegree, Major — School Name, Location\nMonth Year – Month Year\n- Relevant coursework or honors (optional)\n\nSkills\n- Technical: [e.g., JavaScript, Python, SQL]\n- Tools: [e.g., Git, AWS]\n- Soft skills: [e.g., Communication, Leadership]\n\nProjects (optional)\nProject Title — Short description of the project, your role, tech used, and outcome or link.\n\nCertifications (optional)\n- Certification Name — Issuing Organization, Year\n\nAdditional Sections (optional)\n- Volunteer, Languages, Awards, or Interests\n\nReferences\nAvailable upon request\n\nNotes:\n- Keep formatting consistent; prefer reverse-chronological order for experience and education.\n- Save as PDF when sending to employers if a fixed layout is required."]</function_call>

<final_answer>
</final_answer>
